episodes.title: Talk Africa: The mystery of cults
episodes.description:
Cults have been in existence for hundreds of years. Their leaders stand accused of distorting religious doctrines, which has often led followers to tragic ends. This week on Talk Africa, we delve deeper into the mystery of cults, exploring how they operate and why they have persisted.
Subscribe to us on YouTube: http://ow.ly/Zvqj30aIsgY
